Woodland Revels
Gillingham, Dorset Prizes - 1st £5 and cup, 2nd £2, 3rd £1. March contest - 1st Berwick St John. Best soprano and trombone - Berwick St John 4 bands competed.
Dec. 9, 2013, 11:58 p.m. Feb. 18, 2021, 8:23 p.m.
